metadata.title: CVE-2019-17069 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: PuTTY before 0.73 might allow remote SSH-1 servers to cause a denial ofservice by accessing freed memory locations via an SSH1_MSG_DISCONNECTmessage.

criterions.comment: putty: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
